project.name: Velocity Jasmine-Unit
project.description: Velocity-compatible unit test package with jasmine syntax

velocityJasmineUnit.name: velocityJasmineUnit

classitems.description:
A coffee processor that can add source maps to compiled files

This is a modified version of https://github.com/karma-runner/karma-coffee-preprocessor
classitems.name: coffeePreprocessor

params.name: options
params.description: to pass directly to the coffee-script compiler. See here

classitems.description: Load and execute a coffeescript file.
classitems.name: coffeeRequire

params.name: target
params.description: Path to coffeescript file to load.

classitems.description:
Loads a Meteor app's javascript and coffeescript files.
Matches Meteor core's load order.

Excluded directories: private, public, programs, packages, tests
classitems.name: loadFiles

classitems.description:
Returns list of javascript filenames in Meteor app.

Excluded directories: private, public, programs, packages, tests
classitems.name: getJsFiles

classitems.description:
Returns list of coffeescript files in Meteor app.

Excluded directories: private, public, programs, packages, tests
classitems.name: getCoffeeFiles
filterFiles

classitems.description:
Load and execute the target source file.
Will use node's 'require' if source file has a .js extension or
karma's coffeescript preprocessor if a .coffee extension
classitems.name: loadFile

params.name: target
params.description: file path to load, relative to meteor app

classitems.description: Scan all html files in Meteor app and return list of template names.
classitems.name: findTemplateNames

params.name: targetDir
params.description: Optional path to directory to scan.  Default = PWD

classitems.description:
Returns a sort comparator to order files into Meteor app load order.
templateExtensions should be a list of extensions like 'html'
which should be loaded before other extensions.

source: Meteor core file
  https://github.com/meteor/meteor/blob/devel/tools/packages.js#L47-L97
  May 5, 2014
classitems.name: loadOrderSort

params.name: [templateExtensions}
params.description:
Optional array of extensions which will
               be loaded first.

return.description: Either 1 or -1 depending on sort result

classitems.description:
Load framework-supplied stubs.  Stub files are located in the 
'packages/jasmine-unit/stubs' directory and end in -stub.js

Example:
  packages/jasmine-unit/stubs/router-stub.js
classitems.name: loadFrameworkStubs

classitems.description:
Load user-defined stubs.  Stub files should be located in the 'tests' 
directory and end in -stub.js

Example:
  tests/custom-stub.js
classitems.name: loadUserStubs

classitems.description: Create stubs for each template defined in the Meteor app.
classitems.name: stubTemplates
